Changelog
=========

1.3 - 2008-07-03
----------------

* Removed unecessary style attribute on the combo box text field which broke
  rendering in IE 7.
  [fschulze]

1.2 - 2008-06-27
----------------

* Added logic for drop-in replacement of KeywordWidget
  [dunlapm]

1.1 - 2008-05-20
----------------

* Initial release
